lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton, with some help from the moderator, Lester Holt, found her footing during the second half and attacked Mr. Trump on his treatment of women.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

headline.print_headline: Hesitant at Start, Clinton Sought to Leave Trump Out Cold
headline.main: How Hillary Clinton Went From Hesitant to Scorching

snippet: Mrs. Clinton, with some help from the moderator, Lester Holt, found her footing during the second half and attacked Mr. Trump on his treatment of women....
abstract: News Analysis; Hillary Clinton is hesitant and uncertain at start of first presidential debate with Donald J Trump, but finds steadier ground in second half, enabled by moderator Lester Holt; finds success by confronting Trump over disparaging comments about appearance of women.
